comment: Resting now and for the next couple days!!
amr:
# ::snt Resting now and for the next couple days!!
(r / rest-01
      :mode expressive
      :time (a / and
            :op1 (n / now)
            :op2 (a2 / after
                  :op1 n
                  :duration (c / couple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (d / day))))))

comment: That's awesome! Make sure you're able to rest afterwards in case you may experience any flu or cold-like symptoms afterwards
amr:
# ::snt That's awesome! Make sure you're able to rest afterwards in case you may experience any flu or cold-like symptoms afterwards
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / awesome-03
            :ARG1 (t / that))
      :snt2 (e / ensure-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (r / rest-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :time (a2 / afterwards))
                  :condition (p2 / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (e2 / experience-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (o / or
                                    :op1 (s / symptom
                                          :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                                                :ARG2 (d / disease
                                                      :name (n / name
                                                            :op1 "influenza"))))
                                    :op2 (s2 / symptom
                                          :ARG1-of (r3 / resemble-01
                                                :ARG2 (c / cold-01))))
                              :time a2)))))
